knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Lecture des données
```{r echo = FALSE}
# Importation des données 
my_dtf_initial <- read.table("data/placenta.txt", header = TRUE, row.names = "NOM", dec = ".") # Première ligne et colonne en indice
dim_initial <- dim(my_dtf_initial) # premières dimensions
cat("Le dtf initial est de dimensions", dim_initial, ".")
# str(my_dtf_initial)
# summary(my_dtf_initial)

ind_char <- c(1,3)
ind_ci_2 <- which(colnames(my_dtf_initial) == "CI" | colnames(my_dtf_initial) == "CI3")
ind_ci_3 <- which(colnames(my_dtf_initial) == "CI" | colnames(my_dtf_initial) == "CI2")
my_dtf2 <- my_dtf_initial[,-c(ind_char, ind_ci_2)]
my_dtf3 <- my_dtf_initial[,-c(ind_char, ind_ci_3)]
```
